Class SimpleNote

public class SimpleNote

Class for interacting with the SimpleNote web service simplenoteapp.com

Method Detail

getToken

public java.lang.String getToken()
                          throws ConnectionFailed
Method to retrieve an auth token. The cached global token is looked up and returned if it exists. If it is null a new one is requested and returned.

Returns:
SimpleNote API token
Throws:
ConnectionFailed

Parameters:

updateNote

public SNote updateNote(SNote note)
                 throws ConnectionFailed
Update the note

Parameters:
note - object with (presumably) some values updated.
Returns:
the new note object If no changes have been made by other clients since the last update, then content will not be included in the response note object. If there have been other changes then content will be returned and the client should update their local store accordingly.
Throws:
ConnectionFailed

deleteNote

public void deleteNote(java.lang.String noteID)
                throws ConnectionFailed
Delete (obliterate as opposed to move to trash) a note with a certain ID Note: To move a note to trash flag the note as "trash()" and update the note on the server.

Parameters:
noteID - ID of the note to delete
Throws:
ConnectionFailed

deleteNote

public void deleteNote(SNote note)
                throws ConnectionFailed
Delete (obliterate as opposed to move to trash) a note Note: To move a note to trash flag the note as "trash()" and update the note on the server.

Parameters:
note - note to delete
Throws:
ConnectionFailed

getNoteList

public SNote[] getNoteList()
                    throws ConnectionFailed
Obtain the list of notes (this includes the notes in the trash) without content. Limited to 20 notes. Use getNoteList(int, boolean) to change this.

Returns:
Throws:
ConnectionFailed
